text: Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week is a series of international fashion weeks supported by Mercedes-Benz. Designers seen during Mercedes-Benz Fashion Weeks include famous designers such as Rosenthal Tee, Mary Katrantzou and David Koma. Known Mercedes-Benz Fashion Weeks include events in Madrid, Berlin, Georgia, Miami, Russia, Istanbul, and Mexico. ==References== Category:Mercedes-Benz Category:Fashion
title: Mercedes-Benz Fashion
